Re: All this stuff about d/ling the original version:

Are the creators still around? Is there a chance that
we can ask them about what to do?

If they don't respond after, say, about five years
straight of trying to contact them, I think we can
apply "abandonware" principles, a la The Home of the
Underdogs. If they do respond, however, we will
default to their decision.
